Manterror/Double Punch/Injector/Smokescreen/Beachcomber:




Smokescreen was about to get to the cliff, turning his head he screamed as he 
had just climbed into the path of Sniper's rocket.  Screaming, he felt the 
rocket pierce his armor as it exploded, slamming him into the wall of the 
rock, then falling 50 ft downwards to rock, unconscious.

---

Beachcomber felt the rocky area he was climbing up shake, almost losing his 
grip but he held it.  He gasped as he saw Smokescreen fall.  "I swear..." he 
said to himself, leaping out of the air, slamming down to the ground from 20 
ft up, Smokescreen slamming on Beachcomber's back, both knocked out, but 
Smokescreen took less damage then he would've if he just hit the rock.

---

Double Punch saw a piece of the cliff brake off.  "I see...they are 
desperate.  He saw Smokescreen fall as he inadvertantly go in the way of a 
rocket, and then saw Beachcomber break his fall.  "Errr...thanks." he said, 
dumbfounded.  Raising an invisible pincher, he fired a energy-signature 
missile off at Sniper.  Raising the other, he fired two missiles off at the 
Ark.

Manterror fired three ion disks at the Ark.

Injector fired two stinger missiles at the Ark.

"Fall back!" Double Punch yelled, running backwards until he was 20 ft away, 
moving to the right 5 feet, slowly walking backwards towards the Pred base, 
pinchers raised.

Injector looked to Cyber Claw.  "They obviously think your with us!  If you 
stay here your dead, follow us!  We can probably get you to meet Megatron.  
Hell Beast will know where Megatron is." he said, running towards the Pred 
base, Manterror going a little slower than him.
